MIN_LENGTH: {property} must be longer than or equal to ({constraints.0}) characters.
MAX_LENGTH: {property} must be shorter than or equal to ({constraints.0}) characters.
MIN: {property} must be bigger than or equal to ({constraints.0})
MAX: {property} must be smaller than or equal to ({constraints.0})
IS_ALPHANUMERIC: {property} must contain only letters and numbers.
IS_NUMBER: {property} must be a number conforming to the specified constraints.
IS_DATE_STRING: {property} must be a valid ISO 8601 date string.
IS_ENUM: {property} must be a valid enum value. {enum}
IS_BOOLEAN_STRING: {property} must be a boolean string value.
NESTED_VALIDATION: Nested property {property} must be either object or array.
IS_MONGO_ID_ARRAY: each value in {property} must be a mongodb id.
